documentation.text:
@dev as the contract extends the VersionedInitializable contract to match the state
 of the LendingPool contract, the getRevision() function is needed.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Health factor is not below the threshold"

components.value: Health factor is not below the threshold

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(uint256,literal_string "Health factor is not below the threshold")
literal_string "The collateral chosen cannot be liquidated"

components.value: The collateral chosen cannot be liquidated

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(uint256,literal_string "The collateral chosen cannot be liquidated")
literal_string "User did not borrow the specified currency"

components.value: User did not borrow the specified currency

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(uint256,literal_string "User did not borrow the specified currency")
literal_string "There isn't enough liquidity available to liquidate"

components.value: There isn't enough liquidity available to liquidate

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(uint256,literal_string "There isn't enough liquidity available to liquidate")

LiquidationCall(address,address,address,.details: emitted when a borrower is liquidated

params._accruedBorrowInterest: the amount of interest accrued by the borrower since the last action
params._collateral: the address of the collateral being liquidated
params._liquidatedCollateralAmount: the amount of collateral being liquidated
params._receiveAToken: true if the liquidator wants to receive aTokens, false otherwise
params._user: the address of the user being liquidated

OriginationFeeLiquidated(address,address.details: emitted when a borrow fee is liquidated

params._collateral: the address of the collateral being liquidated
params._liquidatedCollateralForFee: the amount of collateral received by the protocol in exchange for the fee
params._user: the address of the user being liquidated

liquidationCall(address,address,address,.details: users can invoke this function to liquidate an undercollateralized position.

params._purchaseAmount: the amount of principal that the liquidator wants to repay
params._receiveAToken: true if the liquidators wants to receive the aTokens, false if he wants to receive the underlying asset directly*
params._reserve: the address of the principal reserve
